page.title: 17MELSONBY-The Playing Field
page.content:
The playing field which covers about 1\ acres is on land owned by the Richmondshire District Council. It adjoins the land used as allotments.
There are no longer any organised cricket or football teams in the village but children & teenagers play these and other games there on a random basis.The primary schoolchidren also use the field for games each week.
Recently, swings have been erected in one corner of the field for use by older children. The younger children have also been given new swings, a see-saw and climbing frame but these are sited in the playing area off St. James' Close. The field and play area are maintained by the District Council
